original_title: La sesenta: Crónicas de una lucha obrera
overview: Faced with the death of a comrade, the workers of Line 60 look for lessons in past struggles in order to confront the boss once again. Santiago, one of them, reviews in his chronicles the pages of the last triumph in order to write his story: that of a collective of combative workers.
title: La sesenta: Crónicas de una lucha obrera
